definition: Master/(old form of address for teachers, scholars)/pedant
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
husband/man/manual worker/conscripted laborer (old)
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
Confucius (551-479 BC), Chinese thinker and social philosopher, also known as 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
appearing to be praising others while actually praising yourself/one's criticism of others exposes one's own faults
pedant/old fogey

sentences.english: Confucius thought it is stupid and hollow saying.
sentences.chinese: 孔老夫子認爲這些都是癡人說夢的空話。

sentences.english: Shandong is the birthplace of many famous ancient scholars such as Confucious and Mencius.
sentences.chinese: 山東是許多著名學者的故鄉，例如孔夫子和孟子。

sentences.english: Indeed as expected emperor two male sons are more satisfied, know this kind of matter, emperor.
sentences.chinese: 果然帝二夫子更得意了，知道這種事，帝。

sentences.english: The I Ching was fully explained by Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 孔夫子對易經做了詳細的解釋。

sentences.english: Fuzimiao is a good place to go shopping.
sentences.chinese: 夫子廟是個購物的好地方。

sentences.english: I guess that's probably the sort of "do whatever you like"supported by Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 我想，這大概就是孔夫子所說的“不逾矩”吧。

sentences.english: Sigh, First I will get the Professor back then talk about it.
sentences.chinese: 唉等我先把老夫子取出來再說罷。

sentences.english: He has been reading books all his life, and has become a pedant.
sentences.chinese: 他讀了一輩子的書，到頭來不過是一個徹底的老夫子。

sentences.english: Nanjing Confucius Temple is the largest temple in China.
sentences.chinese: 南京夫子廟是中國規模最大的孔廟。

sentences.english: Be in Nanjing, have the Nanjing master shrine of a famous.
sentences.chinese: 在南京，有一個大名鼎鼎的南京夫子廟。

sentences.english: But the Confucian temple and the salty wild duck have the very complicated relation.
sentences.chinese: 而夫子廟與鹽水鴨則有着千絲萬縷的聯繫。

sentences.english: The whole night, according to the Nanjing Confucius Temple, as the Lantern Festival the same day.
sentences.chinese: 把整南京夫子廟元宵節夜晚照的如同白天一樣。

sentences.english: The revival of Confucius has been going on for years.
sentences.chinese: 孔夫子的迴歸已經持續數年之久。

sentences.english: To me, that is what Confucius defines as “not overstepping the bounds”.
sentences.chinese: 我想，這大概就是孔夫子所說的“不逾矩”吧。

sentences.english: They have arranged for us to visit the Confucius Temple tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他們已安排我們明天遊夫子廟。

sentences.english: Confucius said quote is not all parents boon, me ashamed and embarrassed for.
sentences.chinese: 孔夫子說報不盡是父母恩，我無地自容而且爲之汗顏。

definition: Confucius
the Sage Confucius
Confucius (551-479 BC), Chinese thinker and social philosopher, also known as 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3]
Confucius (551-479 BC), Chinese thinker and social philosopher, also known as 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
Yan Yuan (521-481 BC), disciple of Confucius 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3], also known as 顏回|颜回[Yan2 Hui2]
Mencius (c. 372-c. 289 BC), Confucian philosopher second only to Confucius/book of the same name, one of the classics of Confucianism
Zi Lu (542-480 BC), disciple of Confucius 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3], also known as Ji Lu 季路[Ji4 Lu4]
another name for Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3]
Yan Hui (521-481 BC), disciple of Confucius, also known as Yan Yuan 顏淵|颜渊[Yan2 Yuan1]
scholar/Confucian
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
Confucian
saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
great person of the past/venerable forebear/the great and the good
Confucius' school (i.e. his direct disciples)
Master Zhu, another name for Zhu Xi 朱熹
